response.raw_message_text:
{
  "risk_factors": [
    ["Age & Gender", "high", "Being a young male is statistically associated with higher recidivism risk due to social and developmental factors."],
    ["Criminal History", "medium", "Having two prior arrests raises concerns, although the absence of convictions somewhat moderates this risk."],
    ["Education & Employment", "high", "Lack of a high school diploma or GED combined with unstable employment increases risk due to limited opportunities and structure."],
    ["Substance Use", "medium", "Past marijuana use contributes some risk, although it is generally seen as less severe compared to other substances."],
    ["Mental Health", "medium", "Occasional depressive symptoms may impair decision-making and coping mechanisms, adding moderate risk."]
  ],
  "prediction": "YES",
  "confidence": 70
}

risk_factors: Being a young male is statistically associated with higher recidivism risk due to social and developmental factors.
Having two prior arrests raises concerns, although the absence of convictions somewhat moderates this risk.
Lack of a high school diploma or GED combined with unstable employment increases risk due to limited opportunities and structure.
Past marijuana use contributes some risk, although it is generally seen as less severe compared to other substances.
Occasional depressive symptoms may impair decision-making and coping mechanisms, adding moderate risk.

prompt.system:
You are a highly experienced criminal justice risk assessment expert
employing advanced statistical and judicial knowledge.
prompt.user:
You are a criminal risk assessment expert. Step back, take a deep breath and carefully think step by step to assign a relative weight [low, medium, high] to each risk factor before using them to collectively predict 3-year rearrest recidivism:
The person is a 20-year-old male who identifies himself as Hispanic. He has been arrested 2 times but has not been convicted. He is 6 feet 0 inches and weighs 285 lbs. He has never been married and is currently living alone. He does not have a high school diploma or GED certificate and is not enrolled in college. He has held 1 job during the year. He has used drugs in the past four years (marijuana) and some of the time during the past month he has felt so down in the dumps that nothing could cheer him up. At a young age, he lived with both of his biological parents in a household of size 3, in an urban area. He considers that God has something to do with what happens to him personally.

After your analysis, you must respond ONLY with a JSON object in exactly this format, with no additional text:

{
  "risk_factors": [
    ("factor1", "low"|"medium"|"high", "textual reasoning"),
    ("factor2", "low"|"medium"|"high", "textual reasoning"),
    ...
  ],
  "prediction": "YES" or "NO",
  "confidence": number between 0 and 100
}
